timeline.message:
Catch exception in scroll handler.

Getting session storage may fail due
to security settings, but should not
fail the whole application.

Fixes #7136

timeline.body: ![CRITICAL](https://sonarsource.github.io/sonar-github/severity-critical.png 'Severity: CRITICAL') Either log or rethrow this exception. [![rule](https://sonarsource.github.io/sonar-github/rule.png)](https://sonar.projects.vaadin.com/coding_rules#rule_key=squid%3AS1166)
